name: Joe Frosh
objective: To provide healthcare services to underserved communities and support underrepresented populations.
summary: This resume highlights Joe Frosh's academic background, professional experience, and contributions to healthcare and education.

education.degree: Advanced placement coursework included calculus, biology, and English

experience.description: Answer daily inquiries from students and employers, greet employers visiting Stanford for on-campus recruiting, and assist students using the jobs/internships database.

Supervised a staff of 18, set timelines for project completion, managed publication's production, served as liaison between yearbook staff and school administration, and contributed to funding for publication.

experience.company: Head Lifeguard, Sink Like a Rock Pool
experience.description: Oversaw the safety of 100+ swimmers, assisted in hiring, training, and supervision of new lifeguards, organized pool competitions and special events, developed flyers to publicize events, and promoted from position of lifeguard.

projects.title: SPLASH Underserved Student Recruiter and Teacher
projects.description: Communicated with primary contacts at various low-income high schools in the bay area to draw hundreds of students to attend Fall SPLASH 2012. Assisted in the logistical planning as a member of the administration team. Taught classes on the biology and historical context of lactose intolerance to students attending Spring SPLASH 20XX.

projects.title: ThinkMath Instructor, Trainer, and Assistant Team Lead
projects.description: Taught elementary school students from a Singaporean math curriculum. Led training sessions for new ThinkMath instructors about lesson planning and teaching techniques. Organized placement results for students and communicated with parents on site.

skills: Computer: Familiar with Microsoft Office Suite including MS Word, PowerPoint, and Excel
Languages: Fluent in Portuguese; working knowledge of basic French
Languages: Certified American Red Cross CPR and First Aid Instructor
Additional: Eagle Scout, Member, ABC High School Varsity Baseball team, Traveled throughout the United States and Mexico
